hero.subtitle: ECO HUB KOSOVA is Kosovo's first circular economy platform, created to connect partners, promote collaboration, and build a sustainable economy.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.subtitle: Building a sustainable circular economy in Kosovo through collaboration and innovation
mission.description1: To create a platform that facilitates collaboration between organizations, businesses, and individuals to build a sustainable circular economy in Kosovo.
mission.description2: We aim to be the catalyst that transforms how Kosovo manages resources, creates value, and builds a sustainable future.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description1: To become the leading platform for circular economy in the Western Balkans, serving as a model for other countries in the region.
vision.description2: We aim for a Kosovo where waste is minimized, resources are reused, and the economy develops in harmony with the environment.

objectives.title: Strategic Objectives
objectives.description: Key goals guiding us towards realizing our mission

networking.title: Partner Networking
networking.description: Connect at least 100 organizations and businesses in our network within the first year.

resources.title: Resource Exchange
resources.description: Facilitate the exchange of 1000 tons of recyclable materials per year.

education.title: Education and Awareness
education.description: Publish 50 educational articles and organize 12 events per year.

projects.title: Project Support
projects.description: Support the realization of 25 circular economy projects.

innovation.title: Technological Innovation
innovation.description: Develop digital tools that facilitate the circular economy.

regional.title: Regional Impact
regional.description: Expand our model to other Western Balkan countries.

principles.title: Guiding Principles
principles.description: Values that shape every aspect of our work

commitment.title: Commitment
commitment.description: We are committed to our mission and the community we serve.

creativity.title: Creativity
creativity.description: We seek creative solutions for complex circular economy challenges.

focus.title: Focus
focus.description: We maintain clear focus on our objectives and measurable results.

transparency.title: Transparency
transparency.description: We operate with full transparency and responsibility towards the community.

strategies.title: How We Achieve Our Mission
strategies.description: Strategies and methods we use to achieve our goals

network.title: 1. Network Building
network.description: We create a strong partner network through events, meetings, and the digital platform facilitating communication and collaboration.

knowledge.title: 2. Knowledge Exchange
knowledge.description: We organize trainings, workshops, and publish educational materials to raise awareness and capacities.

market.title: 3. Market Facilitation
market.description: We create a digital marketplace where organizations can exchange resources, materials, and services efficiently.

support.title: 4. Technical Support
support.description: We offer consultancy and technical support for organizations wishing to implement circular economy projects.

sustainability.desc: We promote practices that preserve the environment and ensure a sustainable future.

collaboration.desc: We believe in the power of collaboration to achieve common goals.
